mapper.select: SELECT HOUR(rental_datetime) AS label, COUNT(*) AS count FROM fast_reservation GROUP BY HOUR(rental_datetime) ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT CONCAT(p.parking_province, ' ', p.parking_district) AS label, COUNT(*) AS count FROM fast_reservation fr JOIN parking p ON fr.rental_location = p.parking_id GROUP BY p.parking_province, p.parking_district ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT m.model_name AS label, COUNT(*) AS count FROM fast_reservation fr JOIN car c ON fr.car_id = c.car_id JOIN model m ON c.model_id = m.model_id GROUP BY m.model_name ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT m.model_name AS label, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, fr.rental_datetime, fr.return_datetime)) AS count FROM fast_reservation fr JOIN car c ON fr.car_id = c.car_id JOIN model m ON c.model_id = m.model_id -- 모델명을 가져오기 위해 model 테이블을 JOIN WHERE fr.return_datetime IS NOT NULL GROUP BY m.model_name ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT CONCAT(p.parking_province, ' ', p.parking_district) AS label, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, fr.rental_datetime, fr.return_datetime)) AS count FROM fast_reservation fr JOIN parking p ON fr.rental_location = p.parking_id WHERE fr.return_datetime IS NOT NULL GROUP BY p.parking_province, p.parking_district ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT u.user_name AS label, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, fr.rental_datetime, fr.return_datetime)) AS count FROM fast_reservation fr JOIN user u ON fr.user_num = u.user_num WHERE fr.return_datetime IS NOT NULL GROUP BY u.user_name ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5;
